answers.answer: Hi there!This is likely to be due to retrograde ejaculation and could occur due to a few secondary causes such as surgery, diabetes, medication side effect etc. It may occur continuously or intermittently and the diagnosis would need to be confirmed by a urine test. A few medications are available that may help control the situation and possible complications with non-surgical causes. I would suggest consulting a urologist for an evaluation and appropriate management.Hope this is helpful.Take care!

question: SIR, I AM 30 YEAR OLD MALE , SIR I HAVE BEEN  FROM LAST 6 YEARS SEMEN IS PASSED WITH URINE , AT THE FIRST DAY AT LEAST  6 OR 7 TIMES I WENT FOR PEE WITHIN EVERY 5 MIN BUT I DONT JUDGE AT THAT TIME THAT WHAT IS GOING ON, BUT AT THE NEXT DAY  I FELT SOME DIFFERENT ,I DIDNT FEEL ANY POWER NOTHING ,SO NOW AFTER SIX YEARS I  AM FEELING  MENTALLY AND PHYSICALLY WEAKNESS  ,AND I HAVE BEEN CHECKED IT IN THE LABORATORY BUT THERE IS NOT GETTING ANY SIGN THAT SEMEN IS PASSES WITH URINE BUT I KNOW THAT WHEN I PASS URINE IT STARTS  LIKE SOME MILKY COLOR AND THEN IT CHANGE LIKE WATER COLOR AND AFTER COMPLETING URINE ,I FELT SOME PROBLEMN IN PENIS AND ALSO FELT SOME WEAKNESS IN THE BODY ,NOW PLEASE SIR HELP ME HOW  CAN I SORT THIS PROBLEMN ,IS THERE IS ANY WAY TO FIND OUT THAT SEMEN IS PASS WITH URINE,THANKS
title: SIMEN PASS WITH URINE
